name: LogonStudio Windows XP Logon Screen
summary: Learn about .LOGONXP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: LogonStudio logon screens for Windows Vista use the .LOGONVISTA extension.

description: Custom logon screen format used by LogonStudio, a program for customizing the Windows logon screen; may include a background image, as well as custom lettering and buttons that can be applied to the Windows XP logon screen.
